title: The Loire valley = La Vallee de la Loire
brief_description: The River Loire is the longest river in France and travels through many scenic and historic regions whose chateaux are world famous. It is also an important French wine producing area. This fascinating tour visits the region’s vineyards, press houses, cellars and tasting rooms as it records their different grape varieties and production methods, that yield red, white and rose wines.
